formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'DumpChan' =-
[Synopsis] Dump Info About The Calling Channel
[Description] DumpChan([<min_verbose_level>]) Displays information on channel and listing of all channel variables. If min_verbose_level is specified, output is only displayed when the verbose level is currently set to that number or greater.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
